snippet: Eva-Maria Westbroek stars as a poignantly restless housewife in the Metropolitan Opera’s production of Shostakovich’s earthy “Lady Macbeth of Mtsensk.”
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews Metropolitan Opera production of Shostakovich's Lady Macbeth of Mtsensk, directed by Graham Vick and starring soprano Eva-Maria Westbroek.
lead_paragraph: Eva-Maria Westbroek stars as a poignantly restless housewife in the Metropolitan Opera’s production of Shostakovich’s earthy “Lady Macbeth of Mtsensk.”

headline.print_headline: How to Beat the Housewife Blues
headline.seo: Met’s ‘Lady Macbeth of Mtsensk’ Stars Eva-Maria Westbroek
headline.main: How to Cure the Housewife Blues
